14-For Protection And Help From Allah.translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.

15-For Protection And Help From Allah.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul 'a'oothu birabbil-falaq. Min sharri maa khalaq. Wa min sharri ghaasiqin 'ithaa waqab. Wa min sharrin-naffaathaati fil-'uqad. Wa min sharri haasidin 'ithaa hasad
15-For Protection And Help From Allah.translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.

16-For Protection And Help From Allah.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem . Qul 'a'oothu birabbin-naas . Malikin-naas . 'Ilaahin-naas . Min sharril-waswaasil-khannaas. Allathee yuwaswisu fee sudoorin-naas. Minal-jinnati wannaas
16-For Protection And Help From Allah.translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.

For Protection From Ignorance.transliteration: Aoothu billahi an akoona minal jahileen
For Protection From Ignorance.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from being among the ignorant.

1-For Protection From Oppressors.ar-text: اًريِصَن َكْنُدَل ْنِم اَنَل ْلَعْجاَو اًّيِلَو َكْنُدَل ْنِم اَنَل ْلَعْجاَو اَهُلْهَأ ِمِلاَّظلا ِةَيْرَقْلا ِهِذَٰه ْنِم اَنْجِرْخَأ اَنَّبَر
1-For Protection From Oppressors.transliteration: rabbana akhrijna min hathihialqaryati aththalimi ahluhawajAAal lana min ladunka waliyyan wajAAallana min ladunka naseera
1-For Protection From Oppressors.translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.

2-For Protection From Oppressors.transliteration: Allaahumma 'Anta 'adhudee, wa 'Anta naseeree, bika 'ajoolu, wa bika 'asoolu, wa bika 'uqaatilu
2-For Protection From Oppressors.translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.

1-For Protection From Satan Shaytan.transliteration: Rabbi ‘a`outhubika min hamazaatish-shayaateeni, wa ‘a`outhu bika rabbi ‘ay-yahdhuroon
1-For Protection From Satan Shaytan.translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.

2-For Protection From Satan Shaytan.translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.

3-For Protection From Satan Shaytan.transliteration: A'oothu bikalimaatil-laahit-taammaati min sharri maa khalaqa
3-For Protection From Satan Shaytan.translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

1-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.ar-text:
َنيِرِفاَكْلا ِمْوَقْلا َنِم َكِتَمْحَرِب اَنِّجَنَو 
 َنيِمِلاَّظلا ِمْوَقْلِل ًةَنْتِف اَنْلَعْجَت اَل اَنَّبَر اَنْلَّكَوَت ِهَّللا ىَلَع
1-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.transliteration:
Alal Allahi thawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fitnatal lil-qawmidh-Dhalimeen.
 Wa najjina bi-Rahmatika minal qawmil kafireen.
1-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.translation:
Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people.
 And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.

2-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.ar-text: ءاَمَّسلا يِف َالَو ِضْرَألا يَف ٍءْيَش نِم ِهّللا ىَلَع ىَفْخَي اَمَو ُنِلْعُن اَمَو يِفْخُن اَم ُمَلْعَت َكَّنِإ اَنَّبَر
2-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.transliteration: Rabbana innaka ta'lamu ma nukhfi wa ma nu'lin wa ma yakhfa 'alal-lahi min shay'in fil-ardi wa la fis-Sama'
2-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.translation: O our Lord! Truly Thou dost know what we conceal and what we reveal: for nothing whatever is hidden from Allah, whether on earth or in heaven

3-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.ar-text: ىَغْطَي نَأ ْوَأ اَنْيَلَع َطُرْفَي نَأ ُفاَخَن اَنَّنِإ اَنَّبَر
3-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.transliteration: Rabbana innana nakhafu any-yafruta 'alayna aw any-yatgha
3-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.translation: Our Lord! We fear lest he hasten with insolence against us, or lest he transgress all bounds

4-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.ar-text:
َنيِرِفاَكْلا ِمْوَقْلا َنِم َكِتَمْحَرِب اَنِّجَنَو 
 َنيِمِلاَّظلا ِمْوَقْلِل ًةَنْتِف اَنْلَعْجَت اَل اَنَّبَر اَنْلَّكَوَت ِهَّللا ىَلَع
4-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.transliteration:
Alal Allahi thawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fitnatal lil-qawmidh-Dhalimeen.
 Wa najjina bi-Rahmatika minal qawmil kafireen.
4-For Protection From The Wrongdoers.translation:
Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people.
 And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.

For Rain.transliteration: Allaahumma 'asqinaa ghaythan mugheethan maree'an maree'an, naafi'an ghayradhaarrin, 'aajilan ghayra 'aajilin.
For Rain.translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.

For Reciting At Al Mashar Al Haraam.translation:
Allah is the Most Great.
 Allah is One.
 There is none worthy of worship but Allah.

1-For Repentance.transliteration: Astaghfirullaah alladhee laa ilaaha illaa huwal hayyul qayyoomu wa atoobu ilayhi
1-For Repentance.translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.

2-For Repentance.transliteration: Dhalikumu Allahu rabbee alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi uneeb
2-For Repentance.translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.

1-For Righteous Company.ar-text: َنيِحِلاَّصلاِب يِنْقِحْلَأَو اًمِلْسُم يِنَّفَوَت ۖ ِةَرِخآْلاَو اَيْنُّدلا يِف يِّيِلَو َتْنَأ ِضْرَأْلاَو ِتاَواَمَّسلا َرِطاَف
1-For Righteous Company.transliteration: fatira assamawatiwal-ardi anta waliyyee fee addunyawal-akhirati tawaffanee musliman waalhiqneebissaliheen
1-For Righteous Company.translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.

2-For Righteous Company.translation: Our Lord! We believe; write us down among the witnesses.

3-For Righteous Company.translation: Our Lord! We believe; write us down among the witnesses.

4-For Righteous Company.ar-text: َنيِحِلاَّصلاِب يِنْقِحْلَأَو اًمِلْسُم يِنَّفَوَت ۖ ِةَرِخآْلاَو اَيْنُّدلا يِف يِّيِلَو َتْنَأ ِضْرَأْلاَو ِتاَواَمَّسلا َرِطاَف
4-For Righteous Company.transliteration: fatira assamawatiwal-ardi anta waliyyee fee addunyawal-akhirati tawaffanee musliman waalhiqneebissaliheen
4-For Righteous Company.translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.

1-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka 'ilman naafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
1-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.

2-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee
2-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.

3-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.

4-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Allahu lateefun biAAibadihiyarzuqu man yashao wahuwa alqawiyyu alAAazeez
4-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.

5-For Rizq Sustenance.ar-text: َنيِقِزاَّرلا ُرْيَخ َتنَأَو اَنْقُزْراَو َكنِّم ًةَيآَو اَنِرِخآَو اَنِلَّوَأِّل ًاديِع اَنَل ُنوُكَت ءاَمَّسلا َنِّم ًةَدِئآَم اَنْيَلَع ْلِزنَأ اَنَّبَر
5-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Rabbana anzil 'alayna ma'idatam minas-Samai tuknu lana 'idal li-awwa-lina wa aakhirna wa ayatam-minka war-zuqna wa anta Khayrul-Raziqeen
5-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: O Allah our Lord! Send us from heaven a table set (with viands), that there may be for us - for the first and the last of us - a solemn festival and a sign from thee; and provide for our sustenance, for thou art the best Sustainer (of our needs).

6-For Rizq Sustenance.ar-text: َنيِقِزاَّرلا ُرْيَخ َتنَأَو اَنْقُزْراَو َكنِّم ًةَيآَو اَنِرِخآَو اَنِلَّوَأِّل ًاديِع اَنَل ُنوُكَت ءاَمَّسلا َنِّم ًةَدِئآَم اَنْيَلَع ْلِزنَأ اَنَّبَر
6-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Rabbana anzil 'alayna ma'idatam minas-Samai tuknu lana 'idal li-awwa-lina wa aakhirna wa ayatam-minka war-zuqna wa anta Khayrul-Raziqeen
6-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: O Allah our Lord! Send us from heaven a table set (with viands), that there may be for us - for the first and the last of us - a solemn festival and a sign from thee; and provide for our sustenance, for thou art the best Sustainer (of our needs).

7-For Rizq Sustenance.transliteration: Allahu lateefun biAAibadihiyarzuqu man yashao wahuwa alqawiyyu alAAazeez
7-For Rizq Sustenance.translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.

1-For Seeking Allahs Help.translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.

2-For Seeking Allahs Help.ar-text: َنوُمَلْعَت اَل اَم ِهَّللا َنِم ُمَلْعَأَو ِهَّللا ىَلِإ يِنْزُحَو يِّثَب وُكْشَأ اَمَّنِإ
2-For Seeking Allahs Help.transliteration: Innama ashkoo baththee wahuzneeila Allahi waaAAlamu mina Allahi ma lataAAlamoon
2-For Seeking Allahs Help.translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.

3-For Seeking Allahs Help.translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.

4-For Seeking Allahs Help.ar-text: َنوُمَلْعَت اَل اَم ِهَّللا َنِم ُمَلْعَأَو ِهَّللا ىَلِإ يِنْزُحَو يِّثَب وُكْشَأ اَمَّنِإ
4-For Seeking Allahs Help.transliteration: Innama ashkoo baththee wahuzneeila Allahi waaAAlamu mina Allahi ma lataAAlamoon
4-For Seeking Allahs Help.translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.

For Someone Who Lends You Money.transliteration: Baarakallaahu laka fee 'ahlika wa maalika, 'innamaa jazaa'us-salafil-hamdu wal'adaa'
For Someone Who Lends You Money.translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).

For Someone Who Offers You A Meal.translation: O Allah, feed the one who has fed me and drink to the one who has given me drink.

For Someone Who Provides You With Iftar.transliteration: Aftara ‘indakumus-saimun, wa akala ta’amakumul-abrar, wa sallat ‘alaikumul- mala’ikah
For Someone Who Provides You With Iftar.translation: May the fasting (men) break their fast with you, and the pious eat your food, and the angels pray for blessing on you

1-For Success.transliteration: Wama tawfeeqee illa billahiAAalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi oneeb
1-For Success.translation: My success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.

2-For Success.transliteration: Wama tawfeeqee illa billahiAAalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi oneeb
2-For Success.translation: My success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.

3-For Success.transliteration: Wama tawfeeqee illa billahiAAalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi oneeb
3-For Success.translation: My success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return.

1-For Thanking Allah Swt.ar-text: يِلرِفْغا ِّبر ،ِمِيظَعْلا ِّيِلَعلا ِهللاِب اَّلِإ َةَّوُق اَلَو َلْوَح اَلَو ،ُرَبْكَأ ُهللاَو ،ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَلو ،ِهلل ُدْمَحْلاَو ،ِهللا َناَحْبُس .ٌريِدَق ٍءْيَش ِّلُك ىَلَع َوُهَو ،َدْمَحْلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُمْلا ُهَل ،ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل
1-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Laa 'illaha 'illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer Subhaanallahi, walhamdu lillaahi, wa laa 'ilaha 'illallahu, wallaahu 'akbar, wa laa hawla wa laa Quwwata 'illaa billaahil-'Aliyyil-'Adheem, Rabbighfir lee
1-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: There is none worth of worship but Allah alone, Who has no partner, His is the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is able to do all things. Glory is to Allah. Praise is to Allah. There is none worth of worship but Allah. Allah is the Most Great. There is no might and no power except by Allah's leave, the Exalted, the Mighty. My Lord, forgive me.

2-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.

3-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma Rabbanaa wa bihamdika Allaahum-maghfir lee
3-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.

4-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.

5-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.

6-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.

7-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyee wa yumeetu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
7-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Able to do all things.

8-For Thanking Allah Swt.ar-text: َنوُرِفاَكْلا َهِرَك ْوَلَو َنيِّدلا ُهَل َنيِصِلْخُم ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل ،ُنَسَحْلا ُءاَنَّثلا ُهَلَو ُلْضَفْلا ُهَلَو ُةَمْعِّنلا هَل ،ُهاَّيِإ اَّلِإ ُدُبْعَن اَلَو ،ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل ،ِهللاِب اَّلِإ َةَّوُق اَلَو َلْوَح اَل ،ٌريِدَق ٍءْيَش ِّلُك ىَلَع َوُهَو ُدْمَحْلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُمْلا ُهَل ،ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل
8-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku, wa lahul-hamdu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay 'in Qadeer. Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaahi, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu, wa laa na'budu 'illaa 'iyyaahu, lahun-ni'matu wa lahul-fadhlu wa lahuth-thanaa'ul-hasanu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu mukhliseena lahud-deena wa law karihal-kaafiroon
8-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things. There is no power and no might except by Allah . None has the right to be worshipped but Allah, and we do not worship any other besides Him . His is grace , and His is bounty and to Him belongs the most excellent praise. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah . (We are) sincere in making our religious devotion to Him, even though the disbelievers may dislike it.

9-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Subhaanallaahi wa bihamdihi 'Adada khalqihi, wa ridhaa nafsihi, wa zinata 'arshihi wa midaada kalimaatihi
9-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.

10-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!

11-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'at'amanaa wa saqaanaa, wa kafaanaa, wa 'aawaanaa, fakam mimman laa kaafiya lahu wa laa mu'wiya
11-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink, sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.

12-For Thanking Allah Swt.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi hamdan katheeran tayyiban mubarakan feeh, ghayra makfiyyin wala muwaddaAAin, wala mustaghnan AAanhu rabbuna
12-For Thanking Allah Swt.translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.

For Thanking Someone.translation: May Allah reward you with good.

1-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.ar-text: راـّنلا ِباذَعَو رْبـَقلا ِباذَع ْنِم ُهْذـِعَأَو ، ةَّنـَجْلا ُهْلـِخْدَأَو ،هِجْوَز ْنِم ًارْيـَخ ًاـَجْوَزَو ، هـِلْهَأ ْنِم ًارْيـَخ ًالْهَأَو ، هِراد ْنِم ًارْيـَخ ًاراد ُهْلِدـْبَأَو ، ْسـَنَّدلا َنِم ُضـَيْبَألا ُبْوَّثـلا َتْيّقـَن امَك اياـطخْلا َنِم ِهـِّقَنَو ، ْدَرـَبْلاَو ِجْلـَّثلاَو ِءاـمْلاِب ُهـْلِسْغاَو ، هَلـَخْدُم ْعـِّسَوَو ، هـَلُزُن ْمِرـْكَأَو ، هـْنَع ُفْعاَو ِهِفاعَو ، هـْمَحْراَو ُهَل ْرـِفْغا ِّمـُهللا
1-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lahu warhamhu, wa 'aafihi, wa'fu 'anhu, wa 'akrim nuzulahu, wa wassi' mudkhalahu, waghsilhu bilmaa'i waththalji walbaradi, wa naqqihi minal-khataayaa kamaa naqqaytath-thawbal-'abyadha minad-danasi, wa 'abdilhu daaran khayran min daarihi, wa 'ahlan khayran min 'ahlihi, wa zawjan khayran min zawjihi, wa 'adkhilhul-jannata, wa. 'a'ithhu min 'athaabil-qabri[wa 'athaabin-naar]
1-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.translation: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him and cause his entrance to be wide and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave [and from the punishment of Hell-fire].

2-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.ar-text: ُهَدـْعَب انَّلـِضُت الَو ، هَرـْجَأ اـنْمِرـْحَت ال ِّمـُهللا ، نامـيِإلا ىلَع ُهـَّفَوَتَف اّنِم ُهََتْيـَّفَوَت ْنَمَو، مالْسِإلا ىلَع ِهـِيْحَأَف اّنِم ُهَتـْيَيْحَأ ْنَم ِّمـُهللا . اناـثْنُأَو انِرـَكَذَو ، انِرـيبَكَو انِرـيغَصَو ، انـِبِئاغَو ، انِدِهاـشَو انـِتِّيَمَو انـِّيَحِل ْرـِفْغا ِّمـُهللا
2-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lihayyinaa, wa mayyitinaa, wa shaahidinaa, wa ghaa'ibinaa, wa sagheerinaa wa kabeerinaa, wa thakarinaa wa 'unthaanaa. Allaahumma man 'ahyaytahu minnaa fa'ahyihi 'alal-'Islaami, wa man tawaffaytahu minnaa fatawaffahu 'alal-'eemaani, Allaahumma laa tahrimnaa 'ajrahu wa laa tudhillanaa ba'dahu
2-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.translation: O Allah forgive our living and our dead, those who are with us and those who are absent, our young and our old, our menfolk and our womenfolk. O Allah, whomever you give life from among us give him life in Islam, and whomever you take way from us take him away in Faith. O Allah, do not forbid us their reward and do not send us astray after them.

3-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.transliteration: Allaahumma 'inna [name the person] fee thimmatika, wa habli jiwaarika, faqihi min fitnatil-qabri wa 'athaabin-naari, wa 'Anta 'ahlul-wafaa'i walhaqqi. Faghfir lahu warhaw.hu 'innaka 'Antal-Ghafoorur-Raheem
3-For The Deceased At The Funeral Prayer.translation: O Allah, surely [name the person] is under Your protection, and in the rope of Your security, so save him from the trial of the grave and from the punishment of the Fire. You fulfill promises and grant rights, so forgive him and have mercy on him. Surely You are Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.

For The Night Of Destiny Lailatul Qadr.translation: O Allah, indeed You are Pardoning, [Generous,] You love pardon, so pardon me

1-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Aatinaa Fiddunyaa H’asanata Wa Fil Aakhirati H’asanata Wa Qinaa A’d’aaban Naar
1-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!

2-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Aatinaa Fiddunyaa H’asanata Wa Fil Aakhirati H’asanata Wa Qinaa A’d’aaban Naar
2-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!

3-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbana innaka jami'unnasi li-Yawmil la rayba fi innAllaha la yukhliful mi'aad
3-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.

4-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbana innaka jami'unnasi li-Yawmil la rayba fi innAllaha la yukhliful mi'aad
4-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.

5-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Aatinaa Fiddunyaa H’asanata Wa Fil Aakhirati H’asanata Wa Qinaa A’d’aaban Naar
5-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!

6-For This World And The Aakhira.transliteration: Rabbana innaka jami'unnasi li-Yawmil la rayba fi innAllaha la yukhliful mi'aad
6-For This World And The Aakhira.translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.

1-For Travel.ar-text: .َنوُبِلَقْنُمَل اَنِّبَر ىَلِإ اَّنِإَو َنيِنِرْقُم ُهَل اَّنُك اَمَو اَذَه اَنَل َرَّخَس يِذَّلا َناَحْبُس
1-For Travel.transliteration: Subhana-alladhi sakh-khara la-na hadha wa ma kunna la-hu muqrinin. Wa inna ila Rabbi-na la munqalibun.
1-For Travel.translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.

2-For Travel.transliteration: Rabbi Adkhilnee Mudkhala S’idqiw Wa Akhrijnee Mukhraja S’diqiw Waj-a’l Lee Mil Ladunkaa Sult’aanan Nas’eeraa
2-For Travel.translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).

1-For Your Childs Protection.transliteration: U'eethukumaa bikalimaatil-laahit-taammati min kulli shaytaanin wa haammatin, wa min kulli 'aynin laammatin
1-For Your Childs Protection.translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.

2-For Your Childs Protection.transliteration: U'eethukumaa bikalimaatil-laahit-taammati min kulli shaytaanin wa haammatin, wa min kulli 'aynin laammatin
2-For Your Childs Protection.translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.

Forgiveness For Your Parents And All Mus.transliteration: Rabbana ghfir li wa li wallidayya wa lil Mu'mineena yawma yaqumul hisaab
Forgiveness For Your Parents And All Mus.translation: O our Lord! Cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me, my parents, and (all) Believers, on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!

1-Forgiveness For Your Siblings.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee wali akhee wa adkhilna fee rahmatika wa anta arhamur rahimeen
1-Forgiveness For Your Siblings.translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.

2-Forgiveness For Your Siblings.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee wali akhee wa adkhilna fee rahmatika wa anta arhamur rahimeen
2-Forgiveness For Your Siblings.translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.

1-Grant Me Confidence And Eloquence.transliteration: Rabbishrah’ Lee S’adree wa Yassir Leee Amree Wah’–Lul U’qdatam Mil Lisaanee Yafqahoo Qawlee
1-Grant Me Confidence And Eloquence.translation: O my Lord! Open for me my chest. And ease my task for me. And make loose the knot from my tongue, that they understand my speech."

2-Grant Me Confidence And Eloquence.transliteration: Subhanaka laAAilma lana illa ma AAallamtanainnaka anta alAAaleemu alhakeem
2-Grant Me Confidence And Eloquence.translation: Glory be to You, we have no knowledge except what you have taught us. Verily, it is You, the All-Knower, the All-Wise.

1-If You Fall On Hard Times.translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

2-If You Fall On Hard Times.ar-text: .هللاِب ّالِإ َةَّوـُق الَو َلْوـَح الَو ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال ،دْمَحلا ُهلو ُكلُملا ُهل ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال ،ُهل َكيرَش ال ُهَدـْحو ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال , ُهَدـْحو ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال ،رـَبْكَأ ُهّللاَو ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال
2-If You Fall On Hard Times.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wallaahu 'Akbar, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wa laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah
2-If You Fall On Hard Times.translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.

3-If You Fall On Hard Times.translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

In The Last Moments Of Ones Life.translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).

1-In Times Of Happiness.translation:
Glory is to Allah.
 Allah is the Most Great.

2-In Times Of Happiness.translation:
Glory is to Allah.
 Allah is the Most Great.

1-Increase In Knowledge.translation: My Lord! increase me in knowledge

2-Increase In Knowledge.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka 'ilman naafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
2-Increase In Knowledge.translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.

3-Increase In Knowledge.ar-text:
ٍميِلَس ٍبْلَقِب َهَّللا ىَتَأ ْنَم اَّلِإ

3-Increase In Knowledge.transliteration:
Rabbi hab lee hukman wa alhiqnee bis saliheen.
 Waj'al lee lisana sidqin fil akhireen.
 Waj'al nee min warathati jannatin na'eem.
 Waghfir li-abee innahu kanamina addalleen.
 Wala tukhzinee yawma yub'asoon.
 Yawma la yanfa'u malun walaa banoon.
 Illa man ata Allah bi qalbin saleem.
3-Increase In Knowledge.translation:
My Lord! Bestow Hukman (religious knowledge, right judgement of the affairs and Prophethood) on me, and join me with the righteous.
 And grant me an honourable mention in later generations.
 And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
 And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
 And disgrace me not on the Day when (all the creatures) will be resurrected.
 The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children,
 But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart.

1-Morning Remembrance.ar-text: .ِرْبَقْلا ْيِف ٍباَذَعَو ِراَّنلا ْيِف ٍباَذَع ْنِم َكِب ُذْوُعَٔا ِّبَر ،ِرَبِكْلا ِءوُسَو ،ِلَسَكْلا َنِم َكِب ُذْوُعَٔا ِّبَر ،ُهَدْعَب اَم ِّرَشَو ِمْوَيْلا اَذَه يِف اَم ِّرَش ْنِم َكِب ُذْوُعَٔاَو ،ُهَدْعَب اَم َرْيَخَو ِمْوَيْلا اَذَه ْيِف اَم َرْيَخ َكُلَٔاْسَٔا ِّبَر ،ٌريِدَق ٍءْيَش ِّلُك ىَلَع َوُهَو ُدْمَحْلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُمْلا ُهَل ،ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهَّللا اَّّلِٕا َهَلِٕا اَل ،ِهَّلِل ُدْمَحْلاَو ِهَّلِل ُكْلُمْلا َحَبْصَٔاَو اَنْحَبْصَٔا
1-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Asbahna wa-asbahal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah la ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer, rabbi as-aluka khayra ma fee hatha-alyawmi, wakhayra ma baAAdaho, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri hatha-alyawmi, washarri ma baAAdaho, rabbi aAAoothu bika minal-kasal, wasoo-il kibar, rabbi aAAoothu bika min AAathabin fin-nar, waAAathabin fil-qabr.
1-Morning Remembrance.translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil of what follows it. My Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and senility. My Lord, I take refuge in You from torment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.

2-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wabika amsayna, wabika nahya ,wabika namootu wa-ilaykan-nushoor.
2-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.

3-Morning Remembrance.ar-text: .َتْنَأ اَّلِإ َبوُنُّذلا ُرِفْغَي اَل ُهَّنِإَف يِل رِفْغاَف يِبْنَذِب ُءوُبَأَو ،َّيَلَع َكِتَمْعِنِب َكَل ُءوُبَأ ،ُتْعَنَص اَم ِّرَش ْنِم َكِب ُذوُعَأ ،ُتْعَطَتْسا اَم َكِدْعَوَو َكِدْهَع ىَلَع اَنَأَو ،َكُدْبَع اَنَأَو يِنَتْقَلَخ ،َتْنَأ اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَّل يِّبَر َتْنَأ َّمُهَّللا
3-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbee la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtanee wa-ana AAabduk, wa-ana AAala AAahdika wawaAAdika mas-tataAAt, aAAoothu bika min sharri ma sanaAAt, aboo-o laka biniAAmatika AAalay, wa-aboo-o bithanbee, faghfir lee fa-innahu la yaghfiruth-thunooba illa ant.
3-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.

4-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma innee asbahtu oshhiduk, wa-oshhidu hamalata AAarshik, wamala-ikatak, wajameeAAa khalqik, annaka antal-lahu la ilaha illa ant, wahdaka la shareeka lak, wa-anna Muhammadan AAabduka warasooluk (four times).
4-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).

5-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma ma asbaha bee min niAAmatin, aw bi-ahadin min khalqik, faminka wahdaka la shareeka lak, falakal-hamdu walakash-shukr.
5-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.

6-Morning Remembrance.ar-text:

 )ًاثالث(.َتْنَأ َّالإ َهَلِإ اَل ،يِرَصَب يِف يِنِفاَع َّمُهَّللا ،يِعْمَس يِف يِنـِفاَع َّمُهَّللا ،يِنَدَب يِف ينـِفاَع َّمُهَّللا
6-Morning Remembrance.transliteration:
Allahumma AAafinee fee badanee, allahumma AAafinee fee samAAee, allahumma AAafinee fee basaree, la ilaha illa ant.(three times).
 Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-kufr, walfaqr, wa-aAAoothu bika min AAathabil-qabr, la ilaha illa ant (three times).
6-Morning Remembrance.translation:
O Allah, grant my body health, O Allah, grant my hearing health, O Allah, grant my sight health. None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times)
 O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)

7-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Hasbiyal-lahu la ilaha illa huwa, AAalayhi tawakkalt, wahuwa rabbul-AAarshil-AAatheem
7-Morning Remembrance.translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)

8-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: aAAoothu bikalimatil-lahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
8-Morning Remembrance.translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)

9-Morning Remembrance.ar-text: .َيِتْحَت ْنِم َلاَتْغُأ ْنَأ َكِتَمَظَعِب ُذوُعَأَو ،يِقْوَف ْنِمَو ،يِلاَمِش ْنَعَو ،يِنيِمَي ْنَعَو ،يِفْلَخ ْنِمَو ،َّيَدَي ِنْيَب ْنِم يِنْظَفْحا َّمُهَّللا ،يِتاَعْوَر ْنِمآَو ،يِتاَرْوَع ْرُتْسا َّمُهَّللا ،يِلاَمَو ،يِلْهَأَو ،َياَيْنُدَو ،يِنيِد يِف َةَيِفاَعْلاَو َوْفَعْلا َكُلَأْسَأ يِّنِإ َّمُهَّللا ،ِةَرِخآْلاَو اَيْنُّدلا يِف َةَيِفاَعْلاَو َوْفَعْلا َكُلَأْسَأ يِّنِإ َّمُهَّللا
9-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah, fid-dunya wal-akhirah, allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah fee deenee, wadunyaya wa-ahlee, wamalee, allahummas-tur AAawratee, wa-amin rawAAatee, allahummah-fathnee min bayni yaday, wamin khalfee, waAAan yameenee, waAAan shimalee, wamin fawqee, wa-aAAoothu biAAathamatika an oghtala min tahtee.
9-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.

10-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Allahumma AAalimal-ghaybi washshahadah, fatiras-samawati wal-ard, rabba kulli shayin wamaleekah, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, aAAoothu bika min sharri nafsee wamin sharrish-shaytani washirkih, waan aqtarifa AAala nafsee soo-an aw ajurrahu ila muslim.
10-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.

11-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Bismil-lahil-lathee la yadurru maAAas-mihi shay-on fil-ardi wala fis-sama-i wahuwas-sameeAAul-AAaleem.
11-Morning Remembrance.translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)

12-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Radeetu billahi rabban wabil-islami deenan wabiMuhammadin peace be upon to him nabiyya.
12-Morning Remembrance.translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)

13-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Subhanal-lahi wabihamdih, AAadada khalqihi warida nafsih, wazinata AAarshih, wamidada kalimatih.
13-Morning Remembrance.translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)

14-Morning Remembrance.translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)

15-Morning Remembrance.ar-text: .ٍنْيَع َةَفْرَط يِسْفَن ىَلِإ يِنْلِكَت اَلَو ،ُهَّلُك يِنْأَش يِل ْحِلْصَأ ،ُثيِغَتْسَأ َكِتَمْحَرِب ،ُموُّيَق اَي ،ُّيَحاَي
15-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Ya hayyu ya qayyoom, birahmatika astagheeth, aslih lee sha/nee kullah, wala takilnee ila nafsee tarfata AAayn.
15-Morning Remembrance.translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.

16-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer.
16-Morning Remembrance.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)

17-Morning Remembrance.transliteration: Asbahna wa-asbahal-mulku lillahi rabbil-AAalameen, allahumma innee as-aluka khayra hathal-yawm, fat-hahu, wanasrahu, wanoorahu, wabarakatahu, wahudahu, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri ma feehi, washarri ma baAAdah.
17-Morning Remembrance.translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

Offer Salah Regularly.transliteration:
Inna Rabbee la samee ud duaa.
 Rabbij alnee muqeemas salaati wa min thurriyyatee rabbana wa taqabbal duaa
Offer Salah Regularly.translation:
Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
 My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

On Hearing A Bad News.translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.

1-On Hearing Good News.translation:
All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed
 Blessed is Allah

2-On Hearing Good News.translation:
All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed
 Blessed is Allah

1-On Hearing Athan.transliteration: Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah
1-On Hearing Athan.translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.

2-On Hearing Athan.transliteration: Allaahumma Rabba haathid - da'watit - taammati wassalaatil-qaa'imati, 'aati Muhammadanil-waseelata walfadheelata, wab 'ath-hu maqaamam-mahmoodanil-lathee wa'adtahu, 'innaka laa tukhliful-mee'aad
2-On Hearing Athan.translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].

Upon Sighting Of The Crescent Moon.transliteration: Allahumma ahlilhu `alainā bil-yumni wal-iman, was-salamati wal-Islam, rabbi wa rabbuk Allah
Upon Sighting Of The Crescent Moon.translation: O Allah, bring it over us with blessing and faith, and security and Islam. My Lord and your Lord is Allah.

1-Pledge To Allah.transliteration: Innee wajjahtu wajhiya lillathee fataraassamawati wal-arda haneefanwama ana mina almushrikeen
1-Pledge To Allah.translation: Indeed, I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah .

2-Pledge To Allah.transliteration:
inna salatee wanusukee wamahyaya wamamatee lillahi rabbil aalameen.
 La shareeka lahu wa bithalika omirtu wa ana aw walul muslimeen
2-Pledge To Allah.translation:
Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah , Lord of the worlds.
 He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims.

Protection From Foolishness.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I misguide others , or I am misguided by others , lest I cause others to err or I am caused to err , lest I abuse others or be abused, and lest I behave foolishly or meet with the foolishness of others.

1-Seek Allahs Guidance.ar-text: ُهَّللا اَناَدَه ْنَأ اَلْوَل َيِدَتْهَنِل اَّنُك اَمَو اَذَٰهِل اَناَدَه يِذَّلا ِهَّلِل ُدْمَحْلا
1-Seek Allahs Guidance.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi allathee hadaana lihatha wama kunna linahtadiya lawlaa an hadaana Allahu
1-Seek Allahs Guidance.translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.

2-Seek Allahs Guidance.transliteration: fallahu khayrun hafithan wahuwa arhamu arrahimeen
2-Seek Allahs Guidance.translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.

1-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.transliteration: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sameeaul Aleem
1-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.

2-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.ar-text: ُميِحَّرلا ُباَّوَّتلا َتنَأ َكَّنِإ آَنْيَلَع ْبُتَو اَنَكِساَنَم اَنِرَأَو َكَّل ًةَمِلْسُّم ًةَّمُأ اَنِتَّيِّرُذ نِمَو َكَل ِنْيَمِلْسُم اَنْلَعْجاَو اَنَّبَر
2-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.transliteration: Rabbana wa-j'alna Muslimayni laka wa min Dhurriyatina 'Ummatan Muslimatan laka wa 'Arina Manasikana wa tub 'alayna 'innaka 'antat-Tawwabu-Raheem
2-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.

3-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.transliteration: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sameeaul Aleem
3-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.

4-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.ar-text: ُميِحَّرلا ُباَّوَّتلا َتنَأ َكَّنِإ آَنْيَلَع ْبُتَو اَنَكِساَنَم اَنِرَأَو َكَّل ًةَمِلْسُّم ًةَّمُأ اَنِتَّيِّرُذ نِمَو َكَل ِنْيَمِلْسُم اَنْلَعْجاَو اَنَّبَر
4-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.transliteration: Rabbana wa-j'alna Muslimayni laka wa min Dhurriyatina 'Ummatan Muslimatan laka wa 'Arina Manasikana wa tub 'alayna 'innaka 'antat-Tawwabu-Raheem
4-Seek Allahs Satisfaction.translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.

1-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.transliteration: Rabbana wasi'ta kulla sha'ir Rahmatanw wa 'ilman faghfir lilladhina tabu wattaba'u sabilaka waqihim 'adhabal-Jahiim
1-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.translation: Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.

2-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.transliteration: Rabbana innana amanna faghfir lana dhunuubana wa qinna 'adhaban-Naar
2-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.translation: Our Lord! We have indeed believed, so forgive us our sins and save us from the punishment of the Fire.

3-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.ar-text: .َداَعْيِمْلا ُفِلْخُت اَل َكَّنِاۭ ِةَمٰيِقْلا َمْوَي اَنِزْخُت اَلَو َكِلُسُر يٰلَع اَنَّتْدَعَو اَم اَنِتٰاَو اَنَّبَر .ِراَرْبَاْلا َعَم اَنَّفَوَتَو اَنِتٰاِّيَس اَّنَع ْرِّفَكَو اَنَبْوُنُذ اَنَل ْرِفْغاَف اَنَّبَر ۚ اَّنَمٰاَف ْمُكِّبَرِب اْوُنِمٰا ْنَا ِناَمْيِاْلِل ْيِداَنُّي اًيِداَنُم اَنْعِمَس اَنَّنِا ٓاَنَّبَر .ٍراَصْنَا ْنِم َنْيِمِلّٰظلِل اَمَو ۭ ٗهَتْيَزْخَا ْدَقَف َراَّنلا ِلِخْدُت ْنَم َكَّنِا ٓاَنَّبَر .ِراَّنلا َباَذَع اَنِقَف َكَنٰحْبُس ۚ اًلِطاَب اَذٰه َتْقَلَخ اَم اَنَّبَر
3-Seek Forgiveness And Protection From H.transliteration: Rabbana ma khalaqta hadha batila Subhanaka faqina 'adhaban-Naar. Rabbana innaka man tudkhilin nara faqad akhzaytah wa ma liDh-dhalimeena min ansar. Qala Rabbi innee thalamtunafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooruarraheem
 Rabbi bima anAAamtaAAalayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeen
 Rabbi najjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen
Seek Protection From Culprits.translation:
He (Musa) said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me," and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
 My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people."

Settle A Debt.translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.

1-Strengthen Your Imaan.translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)

3-Strengthen Your Imaan.translation: I believe in Allah and His Messenger.

4-Strengthen Your Imaan.translation: Our Lord! Let not our hearts deviate (from the truth) after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from You. Truly, You are the Bestower.

5-Strengthen Your Imaan.translation: Our Lord! Forgive us our sins and our transgressions (in keeping our duties to You), establish our feet firmly, and give us victory over the disbelieving folk.

Talbiyah.transliteration: Labbayk Allaahumma labbayk, labbayk laa shareeka laka labbayk, 'innal-hamda, wanni'mata, laka walmulk, laa shareeka laka.
Talbiyah.translation: Ever at Your service, O Allah, every at Your service. Ever at Your Service, You have no partner, ever at Your service. Verily all praise, blessings and dominions are Yours. You have no partner

To Alleviate Pain.transliteration:
Bismillaah, Bismillaah, Bismillaah
 'A'oothu billaahi wa qudratihi min sharri maa 'ajidu wa 'uhaathiru
To Alleviate Pain.translation:
In the Name of Allah
 I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against.

1-To Be A Pious Muslim.transliteration: Rabbanaa Laa Taj-a’lnaa Ma – A’l Qawmiz’ Z’aalimeen
1-To Be A Pious Muslim.translation: Our Lord! Place us not with the people who are Zaalimoon (polytheists and wrong doers).

2-To Be A Pious Muslim.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen
2-To Be A Pious Muslim.translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.

To Keep Your Family Safe From Transgress.translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.

To Make Us Practising Muslims.transliteration: Rabbana amanna bima anzalta wattaba 'nar-Rusula fak-tubna ma'ash-Shahideen
To Make Us Practising Muslims.translation: Our Lord! We believe in what Thou hast revealed, and we follow the Messenger. Then write us down among those who bear witness.

1-To Trust Upon Allah.transliteration: H’asbiyallaah Laaa Ilaaha Illaa – Huw A’layhi Tawakkaltu Wa Huwa Rabbul A’rshil A’z’eem
1-To Trust Upon Allah.translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

2-To Trust Upon Allah.transliteration: wa ufawwidhu amree ila Allahi innallaha baseerun bil ibaad
2-To Trust Upon Allah.translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.

Upon Drinking Milk.transliteration: Allahumma baarik lana feehi wa zidna minhu
Upon Drinking Milk.translation: O Allah! Bless us in it and give us increase of it.

Upon Entering Home.transliteration: Bismil-lahi walajna, wabismil-lahi kharajna, waAAala rabbina tawakkalna.
Upon Entering Home.translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

Upon Entering Mosque.transliteration: aAAoothu billahil-AAatheem wabiwajhihil-kareem wasultanihil-qadeem minash-shaytanir-rajeem, [bismil-lah, wassalatu] [wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah] , allahumma iftah lee abwaba rahmatik.
Upon Entering Mosque.translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.

When One Sees Someone Sneezing.translation: May Allah have mercy upon you

Upon Hearing Thunder.transliteration: Subhaanal-lathee yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdihi walmalaa'ikatu min kheefatihi
Upon Hearing Thunder.translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.

Upon Leaving Mosque.transliteration: Bismil-lah wassalatu wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah, allahumma innee as-aluka min fadlik, allahumma iAAsimnee minash-shaytanir-rajeem.
Upon Leaving Mosque.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.

Upon Reaching The Yemeni Corner During T.translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire

1-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'aafaanee mimmab-talaaka bihi wa fadhdhalanee 'alaa katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdheela
1-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.

2-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.ar-text: اليـضْفَت َقـَلَخ ْنَّمِم ٍرـيثَك ىلَع ينـَلَّضَفَو ،ِهِب َكالـَتْبا اّمِم ينافاع يذّلا ِهلل ُدـْمَحْلا
2-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'aafaanee mimmab-talaaka bihi wa fadhdhalanee 'alaa katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdheela
2-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.

3-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.ar-text: اليـضْفَت َقـَلَخ ْنَّمِم ٍرـيثَك ىلَع ينـَلَّضَفَو ،ِهِب َكالـَتْبا اّمِم ينافاع يذّلا ِهلل ُدـْمَحْلا
3-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'aafaanee mimmab-talaaka bihi wa fadhdhalanee 'alaa katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdheela
3-Upon Seeing Someone Going Through A Tr.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.

1-When A Loss Occurs.transliteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raajioon
1-When A Loss Occurs.translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.

2-When A Loss Occurs.transliteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raajioon
2-When A Loss Occurs.translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.

When At Mount Safa And Mount Marwah.ar-text: ُهَدْحَو َباَزْحَألا َمَزَهَو ُهَدْبَع َرَصَنَو ،ُهَدْعَو َزَجْنَأ ُهَدْحَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل ،ٌريدَق ٍءيَش ِّلُك ىلَع َوُهو ُدْمَحلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُملا ُهَل ،ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهلِإ اَل رَبـْكَأ ُهللا َو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهلِإ اَل .ِهِب ُهللا َأَدَب اَمِب ُأَدْبَأ
When At Mount Safa And Mount Marwah.transliteration: Abda’u bi maa bada’-allaahu bih allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu laa shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu wa huwa ‛alaa kulli shay’in qadeer, laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu, anjaza wa‛dahu, wa naṣara ‛abdahu, wa hazam-al-’aḥzaaba waḥdah
When At Mount Safa And Mount Marwah.translation: I begin with what Allah began with.Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant and single-handedly defeated the allies.

When Beginning A Meal.translation: In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

1-When Beginning The Fast Seher.reference: NOTE: There is no reference in Hadith for this Dua.

2-When Beginning The Fast Seher.transliteration: Wa bisawmi ghadinn nawaiytu min shahri Ramadan
2-When Beginning The Fast Seher.translation: I intend to keep the fast for tomorrow in the month of Ramadan
2-When Beginning The Fast Seher.reference: NOTE: There is no reference in Hadith for this Dua.

1-For Deceased.translation: O Allah, forgive him. O Allah, strengthen him.

2-For Deceased.ar-text: ِهيِف ُهَل ْرِّوـَنَو ِهِرـْبَق يف ُهَل ْحـَسْفاَو ،نيـمَلاـعلا َّبَر اي ُهـَلَو اَنَل ْرـِفْغاَو ،َنيِرـِِباَغلا يف ِهِبـِقَع يف ُهـْفُلـْخاَو ، َنـيّيِدـْهَملا يِف ُهـََتَجَرَد ْعَفْراَو)همـساب( ٍنَالُف-ـِل ْرـِفْغا ِّمـُهللا
2-For Deceased.transliteration: Allaahummaghfir li (name of the person) warfa' darajatahu fil-mahdiyyeena, wakhlufhu fee 'aqibihi fil-ghaabireena , waghfir-lanaa wa lahu yaa Rabbal-'aalameena, wafsah lahu fee qabrihi wa nawwir lahu feehi
2-For Deceased.translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.

1-Upon Completing Ablution.transliteration: Ashhadu an la ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, wa-ashhadu anna Muhammadan AAabduhu warasooluh.
1-Upon Completing Ablution.translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.

2-Upon Completing Ablution.translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.

3-Upon Completing Ablution.transliteration: Subhanakal-lahumma wabihamdika ashhadu an la ilaha illa anta astaghfiruka wa-atoobu ilayk.
3-Upon Completing Ablution.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.

When Dining At Someones House.transliteration: Allahumma barik lahum feema razaqtahum, waghfir lahum, war hamhum
When Dining At Someones House.translation: O Allah! Bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have Mercy on them.

When Entering Market.ar-text: ٍريِدَق ٍءْيَش ِّلُك ىَلَع َوُهَو ُرْيُخْلا ِهِدَيِب ُتوُمَي اَل ٌّيَح َوُهَو ُتيِمُيَو يِيْحُي ُدْمَحْلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُمْلا ُهَل ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهَّللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل
When Entering Market.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, yuhyee wa yumeetu, wa Huwa hayyun laa yamootu, biyadihil-khayru, wa Huwa alaa kulli shayin Qadeer.
When Entering Market.translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.

When Feeling Frightened.translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.

When Given A Drink.transliteration: Allahumma at’im man at’amani, wasqi man saqani
When Given A Drink.translation: O Allah! Feed him who fed me and give him drink who gave me to drink.

When Going To Mosque.ar-text: .ارون يـنِطْعَأ َّمـُهّللا. ارون يـتْحَت نِمَو ، ارون يـقْوَف ْنِم ْلـَعْجاَو ،ارون يـمامَأ ْنِمَو ،ارون يفْلَخ ْنِم ْلـَعْجاَو ،ارون يرَصَب يف ْلـَعْجاَو ،ارون يعْمَس يف ْلـَعْجاَو ،ارون يناـسِل يفَو ، ارون يـبْلَق يف ْلـَعْجا َّمـُهّللا
When Going To Mosque.transliteration: Allahumma ijAAal fee qalbee noora, wafee lisanee noora, wajAAal fee samAAee noora,wajAAal fee basaree noora, wajAAal min khalfee noora, wamin amamee noora ,wajAAal min fawqee noora, wamin tahtee noora, allahumma aAAtinee noora.
When Going To Mosque.translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.

1-When In Distress.transliteration: Laa Ilaha Illaaa Anta Subh’aanaka Innee Kuntu Minaz” Z’aalimeen
1-When In Distress.translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.

2-When In Distress.ar-text: تـْنأ اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل هـَّلُك يـنْأَش يل ْحـِلْصَأَو ،نْيـَع َةَفْرـَط يسـْفَن ىلِإ ينـلِكَت الَفوـجْرَأ َكـَتَمْحَر َّمـُهّللا
2-When In Distress.transliteration: Allaahumma rahmataka 'arjoo falaa takilnee 'ilaa nafsee tarfata 'aynin, wa 'aslih lee sha'nee kullahu, laa'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta
2-When In Distress.translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.

3-When In Distress.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahul-'Adheemul-Haleem, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu Rabbul-'Arshil-'Adheem, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu Rabbus-samaawaati wa Rabbul-'ardhi wa Rabbul-'Arshil-Kareem
3-When In Distress.translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.

1-When Leaving Home.transliteration: Bismil-lah, tawakkaltu AAalal-lah, wala hawla wala quwwata illa billah.
1-When Leaving Home.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

2-When Leaving Home.transliteration: Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika an adilla aw odal, aw azilla aw ozall, aw athlima aw othlam, aw ajhala aw yujhala AAalay.
2-When Leaving Home.translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally

When Looking Into The Mirror.transliteration: Allahumma antha hasantha khalqi fa hasintha khulqi
When Looking Into The Mirror.translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.

When Offering Condolence.transliteration: Inna lillaahi maa 'akhatha, wa lahu maa 'a'taa, wa kullu shay'in 'indahu bi'ajalin musamman. Faltasbir waltahtasib
When Offering Condolence.translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.

1-While Opening Fast.transliteration: Dhahaba al-zama’ wa abtalat al-‘urooq wa thabata al-ajr in sha Allaah
1-While Opening Fast.translation: Thirst is gone, the veins are moistened and the reward is certain if Allaah wills.

2-While Opening Fast.transliteration: Allahumma inni laka sumtu wa ala rizq-ika-aftartu
2-While Opening Fast.translation: O Allah! For You I have fasted and upon your provision, I have broken my fast.

When Placing The Deceased In The Grave.translation: With the Name of Allah and according to the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah

1-When Prostrating.transliteration: Sajada wajhiya lillathee khalaqahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu bihawlihi wa quwwatihi. Fatabaarakallaahu 'ahsanul-khaaliqeen.
1-When Prostrating.translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.

2-When Prostrating.ar-text: َدُواَد َكِدْبَع ْنِم اَهَتْلَّبَقَت اَمَك يِّنِم اَهْلَّبَقَتَو ،ًارْخُذ َكَدْنِع يِل اَهْلَعْجاَو ،ًارْزِو اَهِب يِّنَع ْعَضَو ،ًارْجَأ َكَدْنِع اَهِب يِل ْبُتْكا َّمُهَّللا
2-When Prostrating.transliteration: Allaahum-maktub lee bihaa 'indaka 'ajran, wa aha' 'annee bihaa wizran, waj'alhaa lee 'indaka thukhran, wa taqabbalhaa minnee kamaa taqabbaltahaa min'abdika Daawooda.
2-When Prostrating.translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.

When Responding To Salam.ar-text: هتاكربو هللا ةمحرلاو مالسلا مكيلع و
When Responding To Salam.transliteration: Wa’alaikum assalam wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh
When Responding To Salam.translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you

When Returning From A Long Journey.ar-text:
هَدـْحَو َبازـْحَألا َمَزَهَو ،هَدـْبَع َرـَصَنَو ،هَدـْعَو ُهللا َقَدَص ،نودـِماـح انـِّبَرِل َنودـِباع َنوـبِئات َنوـبِيآ ،ريدـَق ٍءيَش ّلُك ىلع َوُهو ،دْمَحلا ُهلو ُكلملا ُهل ،ُهل َكيرش ال ُهَدـْحَو ُهّللا ّالإ َهلإ ال 
رَبـْكَأ ُهلل ا ،رَبـْكَأ ُهلل ا ،رَبـْكَأ ُهلل ا
When Returning From A Long Journey.transliteration:
Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar
 La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer, ayiboona ta-iboon, AAabidoon, lirabbina hamidoon, sadaqal-lahu waAAdah, wanasara AAabdah, wahazamal-ahzaba wahdah
When Returning From A Long Journey.translation:
Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.
 None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord. Allah fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant, and single-handedly defeated the allies.

When Sacrificing An Animal.transliteration: Bismillaahi wallaahu 'Akbar [Allaahumma minka wa laka] Allaahumma taqabbal minnee
When Sacrificing An Animal.translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.

1-When Sitting Between Two Sujood Prostr.translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.

2-When Sitting Between Two Sujood Prostr.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee
2-When Sitting Between Two Sujood Prostr.translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.

When Sitting In Prayer Tashahhud.transliteration: Attahiyyaatu lillaahi wassalawaatu , wattayyibaatu , assalaamu 'alayka 'ayyuhan-Nabiyyu wa rahmatullaahi wa barakaatuhu, assalaamu 'alaynaa wa 'alaa 'ibaadillaahis-saaliheen. 'Ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wa 'ash-hadu 'anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa Rasooluhu
When Sitting In Prayer Tashahhud.translation: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.

1-When Someone Insults You.transliteration: Rabbi ohkum bilhaqqi wa rabbuna arrahmanul musta'aanu alaa ma tasifoon
1-When Someone Insults You.translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.

2-When Someone Insults You.transliteration: Rabbi ohkum bilhaqqi wa rabbuna arrahmanul musta'aanu alaa ma tasifoon
2-When Someone Insults You.translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.

1-When Someone Praises You.ar-text: َنوُّنُظيَ اَّمِم ًارْيَخ يِنْلَعْجاَو َنوُمَلْعَي الاَم يِل ْرِفْغاَو ، ُنوُلوُقَي امَبِ يِنْذِخَاؤُت َال ّمُهَّللا
1-When Someone Praises You.transliteration: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon]
1-When Someone Praises You.translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].

2-When Someone Praises You.ar-text: َنوُّنُظيَ اَّمِم ًارْيَخ يِنْلَعْجاَو َنوُمَلْعَي الاَم يِل ْرِفْغاَو ، ُنوُلوُقَي امَبِ يِنْذِخَاؤُت َال ّمُهَّللا
2-When Someone Praises You.transliteration: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon]
2-When Someone Praises You.translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].

1-When Stricken By Tragedy.ar-text: اهـْنِم ًارـْيَخ يِل ْفـُلْخاَو ،يتَبيـِصُم يِف ينْرـُجْا ِّمـُهللا ، َنوـُعِِجاَر ِهْيـَلِإ اَنِإَو ِهلل اّنِإ
1-When Stricken By Tragedy.transliteration: Innaa lillaahi wa 'innaa 'ilayhi raaji'oon, Allaahumma'-jurni fee museebatee wa 'akhliflee khayran minhaa
1-When Stricken By Tragedy.translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.

2-When Stricken By Tragedy.translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.

3-When Stricken By Tragedy.ar-text: اهـْنِم ًارـْيَخ يِل ْفـُلْخاَو ،يتَبيـِصُم يِف ينْرـُجْا ِّمـُهللا ، َنوـُعِِجاَر ِهْيـَلِإ اَنِإَو ِهلل اّنِإ
3-When Stricken By Tragedy.transliteration: Innaa lillaahi wa 'innaa 'ilayhi raaji'oon, Allaahumma'-jurni fee museebatee wa 'akhliflee khayran minhaa
3-When Stricken By Tragedy.translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.

4-When Stricken By Tragedy.translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.

1-When Visiting The Graves.transliteration: Assalaamu 'alaykum 'ahlad-diyaari, minal-mu'mineena walmuslimeena, wa 'innaa 'in shaa' Allaahu bikum laahiqoona [wa yarhamullaahul-mustaqdimeena minnaa walmusta'khireena] 'as'alullaaha lanaa wa lakumul- 'aafiyata.
1-When Visiting The Graves.translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.

2-When Visiting The Graves.transliteration: Assalaamu 'alaykum 'ahlad-diyaari, minal-mu'mineena walmuslimeena, wa 'innaa 'in shaa' Allaahu bikum laahiqoona [wa yarhamullaahul-mustaqdimeena minnaa walmusta'khireena] 'as'alullaaha lanaa wa lakumul- 'aafiyata.
2-When Visiting The Graves.translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.

1-When Visiting The Sick.translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.

2-When Visiting The Sick.translation: I ask Allah who is the Lofty and the Lord of the Mighty Throne that He cures you\n(Prophet Mohammad (SAW.) said that by reciting this dua seven times, the ill person will regain his health and if death occurs then that (death) is a different issue (i.e. death is written it cannot be prevented))

When Wearing New Clothes.transliteration: Allaahumma lakal-hamdu 'Anta kasawtaneehi, 'as'aluka min khayrihi wa khayri maa suni'a lahu, wa 'a'oothu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lahu
When Wearing New Clothes.translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.

When You Are In Need.transliteration: Rabbi innee lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeer
When You Are In Need.translation: My Lord! Truly, I am in need of whatever good that You bestow on me!

1-When You Are Nearing Your Death.translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.

2-When You Are Nearing Your Death.transliteration: Ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu wa 'ash-hadu 'anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa Rasooluhu.
2-When You Are Nearing Your Death.translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.

When You Fail Or Lose At Something.translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.

1-When Waking Up.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee AAafanee fee jasadee waradda AAalayya roohee wa-athina lee bithikrih.
1-When Waking Up.translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.

2-When Waking Up.ar-text: يِل ْرِفْغا ِّبَر ِميِظَعْلا ِّيِلَعْلا ِهللاِب اَّلِإ َةَّوُق اَلَو َلْوَح اَلَو ، ُرَبـْكَأ ُهللاَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَلَو ، ِهلِل ُدْمَحْلاَو ِهللا َناَحْبُس ، ٌريِدَق ٍءْيَش ِّلُك ىَلَع َوُهَو ، ُدْمَحْلا ُهَلَو ُكْلُمْلا ُهَل ، ُهَل َكيِرَش اَل ُهَدْحَو ُهللا اَّلِإ َهَلِإ اَل
2-When Waking Up.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer, subhanal-lah, walhamdu lillah, wala ilaha illal-lah wallahu akbar, wala hawla wala quwwata illa billahil-AAaliyyil AAatheem. \nRabbigh-fir lee
2-When Waking Up.translation:
The Prophet said : ‘Whoever awakes at night and then says:
‘None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without associate, to Him belongs sovereignty and praise and He is over all things wholly capable. How perfect Allah is, and all praise is for Allah, and none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, Allah is the greatest and there is no power nor might except with Allah, The Most High, The Supreme.
and then supplicates:
‘O my Lord forgive me.’ …will be forgiven’ 
“or he said: ‘and then asks, he will be answered.If he then performs ablution and prays, his prayer will be accepted’.

3-When Waking Up.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee ahyana baAAda ma amatana wa-ilayhin-nushoor.
3-When Waking Up.translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.

1-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.

2-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma Rabbanaa wa bihamdika Allaahum-maghfir lee
2-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.

3-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.

4-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.transliteration: Allaahumma laka sajadtu wa bika 'aamantu, wa laka 'aslamtu, sajada wajhiya lillathee khalaqahu, wa sawwarahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu, tabaarakallaahu 'ahsanul-khaaliqeen
4-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.

5-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.

6-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu biridhaaka min sakhatika, wa bimu'aafaatika min 'uqoobatika wa 'a'oothu bika minka, laa 'uhsee thanaa'an 'alayka 'Anta kamaa 'athnayta 'alaa nafsika
6-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.

7-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee thanbee kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa 'awwalahu wa 'aakhirahu wa 'alaaniyata hu wa sirrahu
7-While Prostrating Before Allah In Sujo.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.

While Returning From Travel.transliteration: Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar, Laa ilaaha illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku, wa lahul-hamdu, wa Huwa alaa kulli shay in Qadeer, aaiboona, taaiboona, aabidoona, lirabbinaa haamidoona, sadaqallaahu wadahu, wa nasara abdahu, wa hazamal-ahzaaba wahdahu.
While Returning From Travel.translation: Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.\nNone has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord. Allah fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant, and single-handedly defeated the allies.

When Wearing A Garment.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee kasanee hatha (aththawb) warazaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wala quwwah.
When Wearing A Garment.translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.

3-During Hajj.translation: There is none worthy of worship besides Allah, He is all by Himself, He has no partner, His is the Kingdom, for Him is all praise, He has power over all things. O Allah! Make Nur in my heart, in my ears Nur and in my eyes Nur. O Allah! Open my chest (bossom), make my tasks easy and I seek refuge in You from the whispers of the chest, from disorganisation in working and from the punishment of the grave. O Allah! I seek refuge in You from the evils that come with the wind.

4-During Hajj.transliteration: Abda’u bi maa bada’-allaahu bih allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu laa shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu wa huwa ‛alaa kulli shay’in qadeer, laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu, anjaza wa‛dahu, wa naṣara ‛abdahu, wa hazam-al-’aḥzaaba waḥdah
4-During Hajj.translation: I begin with what Allah began with.Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.
